summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Washington State Convention and Trade Center ("WSCTC"); authorizing the Mayor to enter into a Memorandum of Agreement with the WSCTC to contribute to the expansion of the Washington State Convention and Trade Center; establishing irrevocable commitments of the City to the expansion project; imposing a tax and directing its deposit and uses; expressing the Council's judgment that certain amendments to the WSCTC's PUDA and the related contract rezone would be within the spirit and general purpose of, and would not represent a major departure from, the terms of the existing PUDA and contract rezone; accepting certain commitments of the WSCTC for housing replacement and tenant relocation assistance for the expansion project; and authorizing the commitment of City funds to the Washington State Convention and Trade Center at a future time as delineated in the Memorandum of Agreement.
